ygData.subject: RE: New Paw, old tricks
ygData.msgSnippet: last time i checked, mellifluous motion doesn t get you out of those situations anymore.  at least a few weeks ago, it did not get me out of a gate in kedge or
ygData.messageBody:
last time i checked, mellifluous motion doesn't get you out of those
situations anymore. at least a few weeks ago, it did not get me out of a
gate in kedge or in perma. and by the way, that gm not helping is quite
ludicrous.

Shada


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Remember that corpse situation in Lava. Well, same thing
> happened to a
> friend of mine. We were in Paw getting some snakeskin gloves
> for me, I was
> only 15th at the time and he was 22nd. Well, we got the
> gloves and were
> headed out when my buddy got caught in one of the gates.
